author: Natalia Goodwin
title: Ottawa transit rider group wants old schedule back
description: It's urging OC Transpo to go back to its regular schedule because of the fear of crowded buses in the time of physical distancing.
content:
An Ottawa transit rider group is urging OC Transpo to go back to its pre-pandemic schedule because of the fear of crowded buses in the time of physical distancing.
Bus schedules were modified late last month due to very low ridership in the COVID-19 pandemic… [+2306 chars]
